isis.stitle: FRONT DRIVE AXLE WHEEL ENDS: FABCO SDA-12 - LUBRICATION - UNIVERSAL JOINTS

svcproc.title: UNIVERSAL JOINTS
svcproc.para: Universal joints should be lubricated at each chassis lubrication (approximately 1,000 mile intervals). Vehicles operated with the joints submerged must be lubricated at more frequent intervals. Apply until seepage is detected around each of the rubber cap seals. If all seals do not release lubricant, move the cross laterally in all four directions, then pull down on the bearing cap opposite the side that did not release. Apply lubricant until a flow appears.
